member.name: M:ReusableAgents.ThrottlingAgnet.ThrottlingAgent`2.DoWork(`0)
member.summary: Queue the specified asynchronous workflow for processing

member.name: T:ReusableAgents.ThrottlingAgnet.ThrottlingAgent`2
member.summary: Represents an agent that runs operations in concurrently. When the number of concurrent operations exceeds 'limit', they are queued and processed later

member.name: T:ReusableAgents.ThrottlingAgnet.ThrottlingAgentMessage`2
member.summary: Message type used by the agent - contains queueing of work items and notification of completion

member.name: P:ReusableAgents.BlockingAgent.BlockingQueueAgent`1.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the queue (immediately) (excluding items that are being added by callers that have been blocked because the queue was full)

member.name: M:ReusableAgents.BlockingAgent.BlockingQueueAgent`1.AsyncGet(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Int32})
member.summary: Asynchronously gets item from the queue. If there are no items in the queue, the operation will block unitl items are added.

member.name: M:ReusableAgents.BlockingAgent.BlockingQueueAgent`1.AsyncAdd(`0,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Int32})
member.summary: Asynchronously adds item to the queue. The operation ends when there is a place for the item. If the queue is full, the operation will block until some items are removed.

member.name: T:ReusableAgents.BlockingAgent.BlockingQueueAgent`1
member.summary: Agent that implements an asynchronous blocking queue.
member.remarks: The queue has maximal length (maxLength) and if the queue is full, adding to it will (asynchronously) block the caller. When the queue is empty, the caller will be (asynchronously) blocked unitl an item is available.

member.name: T:ReusableAgents.BlockingAgent.BlockingAgentMessage`1
member.summary: Type of messages internally used by 'BlockingQueueAgent<T>'
